name: Genderbent Name Generator
description: Ever wondered what you'd be named if you were the opposite gender? Unleash your inner alternate ego with our Genderbent Name Generator! Discover surprisingly cool, unexpectedly fitting, and downright hilarious name possibilities. Prepare to be amazed (and maybe a little confused...in a good way!).
introduction: Tired of the same old name? Want to explore your identity in a fun, quirky way? Our Genderbent Name Generator is here to help! We've compiled a massive database of names and gender associations to give you the most authentic (and entertaining) results. Get ready to meet your other half!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's ridiculously easy, we promise!
Marvel at the amazing (or hilariously awful) genderbent name that appears.
Laugh, share, and ponder the mysteries of the universe...or just generate another name!
Feeling creative? Tweak the generated name to your liking. It's your genderbent destiny, after all!
Repeat until you find the perfect name that resonates with your soul...or until you're bored. No judgment here!

faqs.question: How accurate is this generator?
faqs.answer: We've tried our best to ensure accuracy, but let's be honest, names are subjective! Think of this as a fun starting point, not a definitive answer to your gender identity crisis (if you're having one, maybe talk to a professional!).

faqs.question: Can I use the generated name for official purposes?
faqs.answer: You *can*, but we're not responsible for any raised eyebrows or confused looks. Use at your own risk!

faqs.question: Where do you get the names from?
faqs.answer: We've scoured the internet, baby name books, and consulted with name experts (aka, our moms). It's a top-secret process!

faqs.question: Will this generator tell me my true gender?
faqs.answer: Nope. This generator is for fun and entertainment only. Your true gender is for *you* to decide, and no algorithm can tell you that.

faqs.question: What if I don't like the name it generates?
faqs.answer: Generate another one! That's the beauty of it. Keep going until you find a name that sparks joy (or at least amusement).

faqs.question: Can I suggest names to be added to the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're always looking for ways to improve. Send your suggestions our way!
